video_prompt: A formidable humanoid with dragon features moves in a dimly lit, grand setting. Its reddish-brown, scaled skin ripples and flexes with movement. Large horns subtly shift. Piercing orange eyes follow a gaze. A dynamic cape flows behind. Clawed feet shift on a reflective surface. Blue spotlights dramatically sweep, illuminating the figure. Orange and yellow flames flicker and dance around its base. Emphasize powerful, theatrical presence.
image_prompt: A formidable, humanoid figure with dragon-like features, standing powerfully in a grand, dimly lit setting. Reddish-brown scaled skin, large upward-curving horns, and smaller spinal protrusions. Reptilian face with glowing orange eyes. A detailed pendant on its neck. Worn, earthy-toned fabric/leather armor on its lower body, with a flowing cape. Clawed feet on a dark, reflective surface. Overhead blue spotlights create dramatic shadows, and vibrant orange/yellow flames flicker on the ground. Emphasize immense power, ancient lineage, and a theatrical presence on a grand stage.
refined_video_prompt: Scaled skin ripples and flexes with powerful movement. Large horns subtly shift. Piercing orange eyes track a gaze with intense focus. A dynamic cape flows and sways dramatically behind. Clawed feet assertively shift, pressing weight on a reflective surface. Blue spotlights dramatically sweep, dynamically illuminating the figure. Orange and yellow flames flicker and dance around its base, enhancing a theatrical, powerful presence.
